songs.title: Death Bed
songs.lyrics:
Here's to the ones that we got
Cheers to the wish you were here...

songs.title: Bad Liar
songs.lyrics: Oh, hush, my dear, it's been a difficult year...

songs.title: Without Me
songs.lyrics: Found you when your heart was broke...

songs.title: Untuk Perempuan yang Sedang di Pelukan
songs.url: music-data/Untuk Perempuan Yang Sedang Di Pelukan.mp3
songs.lyrics: Tak terasa gelap pun jatuh Di ujung malam menuju pagi...

songs.title: Unstoppable
songs.lyrics: All smiles, I know what it takes to fool this town I'll do it 'til the sun goes down...

songs.title: Chop Suey!
songs.lyrics: Wake up (wake up) Grab a brush and put a little make-up...

songs.title: Faint
songs.lyrics: I am a little bit of loneliness, a little bit of disregard Handful of complaints...
